snippet.title: Junkyard Builder - Turn trash into Gold (Release date trailer)
snippet.description:
Become a proud owner of a once-forgotten junkyard, now brimming with endless potential. Dive into the satisfying world of restoration, recycling, and raw hustle as you transform trash into treasure and rise to become the ruler of the junk empire!

All this and more in Junkyard Simulator, coming to Steam on April 8th in Early Access.
Wishlist the game now:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3339330/Junkyard_Builder/

#junkyardbuilder #simulator #pcgaming
